title: Sooyaalka Farshaxanka Kooban ee Meel Sare - Macbadka Orbital
heading: Sooyaalka Farshaxanka Oo Kooban
intro: Tan iyo markii ugu horreysay ee lagu guuleystey inuu dilo dayax-gacmeed macmal ah sannadkii 1957- kii, in ka badan toban kun oo dayax-gacmeed ayaa ku soo wareegay dhulka. Xilligan cusub, farshaxannadu waxay heleen hab ay ku ballaariyaan dhaqankooda, bannaanka bannaanuna wuxuu noqday nooc cusub oo shiraac ah. Iyadoo taasi jirto, su'aalo aasaasi ah oo ku saabsan siyaasadda sahaminta hawada ayaa soo baxay - inkastoo waxyaabo badan oo badan aan weli la daboolin.

leonov.text: Farshaxankii ugu horreeyay ee lagu sameeyay meel bannaan wuxuu ahaa sawir qorrax ka soo baxa dhulka, oo uu sameeyay cirbixiyeen Ruush ah Alexei Leonov isagoo saaran markabka Voskhod 2 ee 1965 .
leonov.caption: Farshaxankii ugu horreeyay ee lagu abuuray meel bannaan, iyo qalin Alexei Leonov ayaa u isticmaalay inuu sawiro. Sawirka: Matxafka Xarunta Tababarka ee Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Saddex sano ka dib, Matxafka Dayaxa , saxan dhoobo ah oo yar oo loo maleynayo inuu ku soo degay Dayaxa oo ay ku qoran yihiin lix ka mid ah fanaaniinta ugu caansan Maraykanka wakhtigaas: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers iyo Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Sawirka Matxafka Dayaxa ee maqaalkii asalka ahaa ee New York Times. Suulka ayaa qarinaya sawirka Warhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Wax ku biirinta daandaansiga ee Warhol - bidix sare - ayaa mashruucan ka dhigtay mid caqabad ku ah warbaahinta isgaadhsiinta wakhtigaas.
moonMuseum.caption2: Sawirka New York Times ayaa doortay inuu daabaco, iyadoo farshaxanku hoos ka muuqdo iyo sawirka Andy Warhol ee geeska bidix ee sare.

fallenAstronaut.text: Sannadkii 1971-kii , sawir-gacmeed yar oo aluminium ah oo bini-aadmi ah oo loo yaqaan 'Fallen Astronaut' ayaa lagu dhejiyay Dayaxa Apollo 15 cirbixiyeen David Scott . Farshaxanistaha Belgian Paul Van Hoeydonck waxa uu ugu talo galay, gabaygan, inuu ku xuso cirbixiyeennada iyo cosmonauts ee ku dhintay horumarinta sahaminta hawada sare.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Aragtida huurada xusuusta ee ku hadhay dayaxa ee goobta degitaanka Hadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: Sannadihii 1970-aadkii , labada Pioneer Plaques iyo Voyager Probes waxay dejiyeen aragtiyo cusub oo fanka meel bannaan ah. Sidday tabeelo aluminium-anodized ah oo dahab ah oo wata fariimo muuqaal ah oo ka imanaya Dhulka una socda hawada sare ee kale ee laga yaabo inay helaan mustaqbalka fog, waxay nolosha bini'aadamka ku muujinayaan waxyaabaha aasaasiga ah.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 iyo 11 plaques, oo meel qoto dheer la geliyey 1970naadkii.

dove.text: Sannadkii 1990-kii , Brazil waxay calaamadda dhulkan kaga tagtay DoVE/OSCAR-17 , oo ah dayax-gacmeed hiwaayad leh oo leh awood maanso oo weyn. In kasta oo abuuraheedu aanu isku tix-gelinayn inuu yahay farshaxan, haddana waxay ahayd dedaal maanso oo qoto dheer: waxay duubtay codadka carruurta oo codsanaya nabad waxayna u gudbisay in ka badan laba kun oo hiwaayadda raadiyaha ah oo adduunka oo dhan ah, taasoo u beddeshay hormoodka CubeSat shaqo dhawaaq wadareed.
dove.caption: DoVE/OSCAR-17, Dayax gacmeedka gabayga ee Brazil oo gudbiya codadka carruurta ee nabadda, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Sannadkii 2012 , farshaxan-yaqaan Trevor Paglen ayaa bilaabay "Sawirradii ugu dambeeyay" , saxan-yar oo ka kooban 100 sawir oo ku xidhan dayax-gacmeedka isgaarsiinta Echostar XVI ee wareegga juqraafiga. Naqshadeynta balaayiin sano, waxaa loola jeedaa in laga gudbo ilbaxnimada aadanaha sida farshaxan qadiimiga ah mustaqbalka fog.
lastPictures.caption: Sawiradii Ugu Dambeeyay, saxan yar-yar oo loogu talagalay in uu ka dheereeyo bini'aadamka, oo la bilaabay 2012.

ulises.text: 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) waxay soo bandhigtay Ulises I , nanosatellite oo loo maleeyay sida riwaayad fikradeed oo hoos timaada jihada farshaxanka Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Dayax gacmeedka ayaa lagu qaaday stratosphere isagoo saaran buufin inta lagu guda jiro Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Loogu talagalay in uu qarxiyo ku dhawaad afar saacadood oo uu ku soo dego baarashuud.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, opera dayax gacmeed fikradeed oo uu leeyahay Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Ma ahayn ilaa 2014-kii markii ugu horreysay ee dayax-gacmeedkii ugu horreeyay oo farshaxan ah la diray. Jaamicadda Tokyo ee ARTSAT-1 Mashruuci soo duulay waxay u dirtay xogta dhulka taasoo loo isticmaalay qalabyada farshaxanka iyo abuurista muusiga.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Qaabka soo duulayaasha iyo qaybaha hadhaaga ee ku hadhay Dhulka.
artsat.caption2: Hawlgalka [SPACE x ART] - ka baxsan bandhigga Cosmologies ee lagu qabtay Matxafka Farshaxanka Casriga ah ee Tokyo

kac.text: Farshaxanistaha casriga ah ee reer Brazil iyo Maraykanka Eduardo Kac ayaa gacan ka gaystay farshaxanka hawada sare isaga oo kaashanaya NASA iyo SpaceX . Isaga "Telescope Inner" ( 2017 ), oo uu sameeyay astronaut Faransiis Thomas Pesquet , ayaa keentay in farshaxan lagu sameeyay saldhigga hawada sare ee caalamiga ah .
kac.caption: Telescope Inner Telescope oo ku taal Saldhigga Hawada Caalamiga ah, oo lagu abuuray cirbixiyeen Faransiis ah Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: 2018 , CubeSat dadban oo loo dhisay mashruuc farshaxan ayaa loo bilaabay orbit. Waxaa soo saaray farshaxanyahan fikradeed Bahamian Tavares Strachan , Enoch wuxuu ka kooban yahay weel 24-karat-dahab ah oo leh bus ka mid ah cirbixiyeentii ugu horreysay ee Afrikaan-Mareykan ah, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (cutubka bandhiga), 2015-2017. ⓒ Tavares Strachan, sawir ⓒ Matxafka Associates/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Isla sanadkaas, Trevor Paglen's Orbital Reflector ayaa sidoo kale loo bilaabay sidii farshaxan lagu dhex dajiyay CubeSat aan shaqaynayn. Shaqadu waxay ahayd tilmaan farshaxaneed oo loogu talagalay in lagu beddelo sida aan u aragno booska aan adduunka ku leenahay. Si sax ah looma dajin. In kasta oo aan waligeed loo furin sidii loogu talagalay, haddana waxa ay dhalisay wada-hadallo muhiim ah, waxaanay ka bixisay jawaabo xamaasad leh oo ka imanaya cirbixiyeennada, saynis yahannada, xarumaha warbaahinta, barayaasha, ardayda, iyo guud ahaan dadweynaha adduunka oo dhan, taas oo muujinaysa in farshaxanka guulaysta aanu u baahnayn in uu noqdo mid farsamo ahaan guulaysta.
orbitalReflector.caption: Soo Bandhigista Dijital ah ee Milicsiga Orbital, 2018

others.text: Farshaxanno kale oo badan ayaa gacan ka geystay goobta farshaxanka bannaan, mid walbana wuxuu keenay aragtiyo gaar ah cilmi-baaristooda. Mashruucyada la xusi karo waxaa ka mid ah cilmi-baarista astronaut -ka Sarah Jane Pell ee sahaminta waxqabadka bini'aadamka ee jawiga daran; Agnes Meyer-Brandis's Moon Goose Analogue mashruuca ee baaraya sheekooyinka sahaminta meel taariikhiga ah iyo casriga ah; Barnaamijka AstroArts ee Naxuum ee fududeeya tijaabooyinka faneed ee mikrogravity; iyo Arthur Woods's Cosmic Dancer sculpture, farshaxankii ugu horreeyay ee lagu soo bandhigay meel bannaan oo ku taal saldhigga Mir ee 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: In 2025 , ka dib 4 sano oo cilmi-baarista iyo horumarinta, artist Brazil Edson Pavoni iyo koox ka mid ah koox-kooxeedyo badan oo la-hawlgalayaasha bilaabi doonaa Orbital Temple , dayax-gacmeedka farshaxanka ka qaybqaadanaya oo ku martiqaadaya qof kasta oo adduunka ah si ay u soo diraan magacyo si ay u orbit, abuurista a xusuus u dhan yahay oo ka baxsan xuduudaha.
orbitalTemple.caption: Macbadka Orbital ee Mercosul Bienal. Sawirka: Clara Marques

imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Matxafka Moon wafer dhoobada dhoobada ah oo muujinaysa dhammaan farshaxanada
imageAlts.enoch: Unugga bandhiga ENOCH ee Tavares Strachan
